Forgot password MT4 text: Платежный счет - это любой счет, который вы можете открыть в кабинете трейдера. Он будет использоваться, как электронный кошелек для пополнений и снятий средств.
Name: Имя
Drawdown tooltip: A drawdown is the reduction of one’s capital after a series of losing trades. This is normally calculated by getting the difference between a relative peak in capital minus a relative trough. Traders normally note this down as a percentage of their trading account.
Choose the time when requests will be da: Выберите время, во сколько будут ежедневно исполняться заявки на ввод и вывод средств (по серверному времени)
Change subscription status text: До тех пор, пока подписка активна, управляющий может открывать и закрывать позиции на вашем счете. Вы можете отписаться от управляющего в любое время.
No_accounts: У вас нет доступных для подписки инвестиционных счетов. Пожалуйста, создайте {{value}} счет и попробуйте снова.
Agreement: Я принимаю условия использования сервиса, описанные в публичной оферте
After unsubscription text 1:
После отписки все открытые ордера будут закрыты и новые сделки не будут копироваться на ваш счет от этого мастер-счета.

Будьте осторожны: данное действие нельзя отменить.
After unsubscription text 2:
После отписки все деньги с этого счета будут выведены на платежный счет в течение 24 часов в момент ролловера. Все открытые сделки будут закрыты. Новые сделки на счете открываться не будут.

Будьте осторожны: данное действие нельзя отменить.
Use login and trading password of existi: Используйте логин и торговый пароль от существующего МТ4 счета
Используйте логин и торговый пароль от существующего МТ5 счета
CREATE_ACCOUNT_TEXT_1: Мастер-счет используется для управления средствами инвесторов. Каждый раз, когда вы торгуете на мастер-счете, ваши сделки будут распределяться на счета инвесторов.
CREATE_ACCOUNT_TEXT_2: Инвестиционный счет используется для инвестирования средств. Каждый раз, когда управляющий торгует, его позиции копируются на ваш счет.
How to change/reset a password for payme: Как изменить/сбросить пароль для платежного счета?
You can change it inside of trader’s roo: Вы можете изменить пароль в кабинете трейдера или попросить службу поддержки сделать это.
Password must contain at lease 7 symbols: Пароль должен содержать не менее 7 символов, как минимум одну букву и одну цифру.
CREATED_ACCOUNT_TEXT_12:
ПАММ мастер-счет похож на инвестиционный фонд и состоит из счетов инвесторов. Чтобы пополнить мастер-ПАММ-счет вам нужно:
1) Создать инвстиционный счет
2) Подписать его к мастер-счету
3) Пополнить инвестиционный счет

После того, как заявка на пополнение инвестиционного счета будет исполнена, деньги отобразятся на вашем ПАММ-мастер-счете.
ALLOC_METHOD_TOOLTIP:
Если вы активируете эту функцию, каждый раз, когда управляющий будет открывать позицию, на вашем счете будет открываться позиция минимальным объемом, доступным на торговом счете.

Обычно минимальный размер позиции равен 0.01 лоту, и он будет открываться даже, если расчетный размер позиции был меньше.

Когда функция выключена, на вашем счете не будут открываться позиции, если расчетный лот меньше минимального лота, доступного на сервере.
In the list above you can find accounts: In the list above you can find accounts with same account type as a master account below
You have no accounts that you can subscr: You have no accounts that you can subscribe to that master account. Please create a new one.
Process will take less than 1 minutes: Process will take less than 1 minutes
You can withdraw not more than free marg: You can withdraw not more than free margin without closing the account. If amount is bigger than free margin, it will be automatically reduced.
Margin is used for maintaing opened posi: Margin is used for maintaing opened positions. Insufficient margin can cause automatic closing of opened positions (stop-out) to prevent negative balance on your account.
If close some of opened positions on you: If close some of opened positions on your account, it will increase your free margin.
Make a withdrawal from Investment accoun: Make a withdrawal from Investment account
Make a withdrawal from Master account: Make a withdrawal from Master account
CLOSE_POSITIONS_TEXT:
By performing that action you will unsubscribe from all signal providers and all opened positions will be closed.

Opened positions will be closed during trading session.
If you want to withdraw all your funds f: If you want to withdraw all your funds from investment account and unsubscribe from moneymanager - close your account
See your pending Deposit/Withdrawal requ: See your pending Deposit/Withdrawal requests and history transfers between payment account and investment account.
If you want to withdraw all your funds f: If you want to withdraw all your funds from Master account - close your account. But all your investors will be unsubscribed from this account automatically.
Be sure you have enough free margin to m: Be sure you have enough free margin to maintain opened positions on your account after withdrawal.
Withdrawal request will be executed duri: Withdrawal request will be executed during rollover within 24 business hours.
See all your subscriptions and manage th: See all your subscriptions and manage them on My Subscriptions page.
Monitor and manage all your investors on: Monitor and manage all your investors on My Investors page: change allocation methods, activate and deativate them.
Now you can withdraw all funds from this: Now you can withdraw all funds from this account or subscribe it to another money manager.
If you made this request during weekend,: If you made this request during weekend, your positions will be closed when market will open on Monday.
Your account was unsubscribed from a mon: Your account was unsubscribed from a money manager and all opened positions were closed.
Request for closing account successfully: Request for closing account №{{requestNumber}} successfully created
Your account will be closed during rollo: Your account will be closed during rollover within 24 business hours.
After closing account it will be unsubsc: After closing account it will be unsubscribed from a money manager.
All investors was unsubscribed from your: All investors was unsubscribed from your account and all your funds was withdrawn to a Payment account.
Make a deposit to Master account: Make a deposit to Master account
Make a deposit to Investment account: Make a deposit to Investment account
Be sure free margin on payment account e: Be sure free margin on payment account equals or exceed amount of this deposit request.
Deposit request will be executed within: Deposit request will be executed within 3 minutes.
Monitor all your investors’ funds and or: Monitor all your investors’ funds and orders on My investors page.
No deposit available:
You can not make a deposit on investment account until it not subscribed to Master PAMM account.

To subscribe to a PAMM account you need to:

1. Go to a Leaderboard
2. Choose PAMM account
3. Click on subscribe button
All Deposit and Withdrawal requests from: All Deposit and Withdrawal requests from investors are executed during rollover.
You can choose one or several hours and: You can choose one or several hours and set daily schedule for automatic rollovers. (server time)
How to change risk limit: Daily risk limit is your automated risk manager. It will protect your account from big losses in one day. How it works
Please ask our support team to set it. R: Please ask our support team to set it. Risk limit doesn’t work if trader can change it by himself.
What risk limit do: Risk Limit will close all opened positions and unsubscribe you from money manager as soon as it reached. How it works
Login or password combination is incorre: Login or password combination is incorrect
You can not use login of master or inves: You can not use login of master or investment account for sign in.
Next Step: Deposit money to investment a: Next Step: Deposit money to investment account
And start copying signals from a profess: And start copying signals from a professional
